titleStmt.title: Bien venu Great Britaines welcome to hir greate friendes, and deere brethren the Danes
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By R. Bradock] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be solde at his shoppe neere Saint Austens gate,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Iohn Davies of Hereford.
A poem celebrating the visit of Christian IV, King of Denmark and Norway.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
